title: Found this Amazing Concept of Elderwood Camille

replies.body:
God, you never really notice how huge her thighs are until you look at art. 

Awesome skin concept though!
https://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/scarygodmother/images/9/9f/172.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170512191849
http://i.imgur.com/iN2HhXa.jpg{/img]
What is an Archivist and what do you do here? Just curious, never seen one before

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/FpaKxkR8-the-future-of-cc-part-1-meet-the-archivists

There ya' go.
Basically Wardens for SA&S and C&C boards.
I'm really digging the warmer shades on her; it's better distinguishes her from Program, and provides her with a much more unique color palette! <3
What are the odds of the skins team making this exist?
*Really* hard to say, honestly. ;-; We do keep a folder of concepts, though, that we reference when talking about new skins for a particular champion. :)
Out of curiosity, how big is that folder....
One might says that it's thicc.
Extra?
I understand  makes sense, would be cool if real.

It's been too long since I've suggested it so I will throw this your way again.

Human Orianna skin ^_^
I always hope for something not quiet as vague as this. I was like, where are all the rioter comments? Then I find one and I'm like. Tastes legit. Looks Legit. But still REALLY not an answer. kappa.
Ahh, thank you for the input! Color variation was definitely tricky to nail for this, I liked all three! But definitely agree with distinguishing from her other skins
I'd love to see where you run with it, if you move forward with any additional iterations. :3
Can we get Dreadnova Camille with techno-peglegs plz
I will say that I am certainly not opposed to it, haha.
That sounds like a definite maybe to me

Katey the little replies you've been doing to skin concepts is super cute.
Appreciated to see a Rioter commenting for the sake of it. It's really nice.
Thanks for the posts and comments, everyone! :-) Like I said in my Soulweaver Taliyah post, any comments/feedback are greatly appreciated.

My only recommendation is to tweak the particle-samples you have. Despite being a grassy defender of the forest, it still looks a bit too precise/hextech-y. Maybe give her some more flowing elf-y looks to her particles.
100% agree, little branches sticking off her. almost like a maokai texture in places.
Thanks for the replies! Hoping to do another iteration soon and I'll definitely note these (1000% agree with the particles)

Meh. She's all bark and no bite. Pretty creative, although the mask reminds me of Lamb.

I guess I'll leaf this to you guys.

Please make a tree and leaf. ;)

Seriously though, look at this new Elderwood Camille skin I just found!! 

http://imgur.com/oP4rsJr
Why is she upside down?
She's just using her Hookshot. ;)

You ought to be tree-mendously ashamed of such puns, you don't have the qua-leaf-ications. Who knows what you maple next time. 

You have a safe day now oak-ay?
Spriggans? :P
T H I C C
Not thrilled about the hair, the rest I enjoy though.
looks nice, all colors could fit in by having her "chance seasons" when activating her Adaptive Defenses (passive)
Tactical shitty one liner: I want this.
Does Riot ever actually make skins off these?
I want this. Along with Demonblade Camille.
Seems like the perfect wife for maokai
I am the guy from poor country and often lack money to buy skins, but if this skin ever got released im buying it instantly. I dont even play camille.
tbh just looks like azir with an afro
That looks fantastic! However, I'd change the vines and effects to a orange or red shade because Program already uses the green colo pallet.

Was the basic concept that of a Spriggan or Dryad?
Because I think it's super nice.

On top of everything I think this skin would be SUPER dependent on new sound effects.

I feel as if it needs more
There are very few details on her that make it look as if she is a tree, and the face is odd looking and underwhelming
Just my opinions
Maybe add more of a bark texture to the skin? I dunno...looks good imo
this looks so good
